translations: n．养蜂场：用于饲养蜜蜂的地方，通常包括多个蜂箱。
· The beekeeper has several apiaries in the countryside.
养蜂人在乡村有几个养蜂场。

sentences.sentence: Plans, organises, controls, coordinates and operates apiaries to produce honey, queen bee pollen, beeswax and royal jelly, breed queen bees and pollinate crops.
sentences.translation: 养蜂人负责计划、组织、控制、协调和管理蜂房，来生产蜂蜜、蜂王花粉、蜂蜡和蜂王浆，培养蜂王和授粉农作物。
